alert.note: Alert for Attala; Holmes (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 26 at 6:33AM CDT until March 31 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Big Black River At West affecting Holmes and Attala Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Big Black River At West. * WHEN...Until Thursday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:45 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 18.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is near its crest. The river is expected to fall below flood stage Wednesday afternoon, and continue falling to 14.0 feet early Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue Big Black River West 15.0 18.6 Sat 5 am CDT 18.3 17.9 17.3 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN
